   Science or a double major subject with theUTME 
requirements.  
b. IJMB passes in Mathematics and one (1) Science/Social 
Science subject with 'O’ level requirements.  
c. ND/HND credit in Mathematics or any relevant subject 
into 100 level.  
(xxii) AAUA requires three (3) merit at NCE in Education and 
two (2) relevant teaching sciencesubjects.  
(xxiii) FED-DUTSINMA requires two (2) ‘A’ level passes in 
Mathematics and any one (1) of Physics, Chemistry, 
Economics or Geography. Also accepts NCE merit in 
Mathematics and one (1) of Physics, Chemistry or 
Economics or ND with good grades and relevant UTME 
subjects.  
  
UTME  
(i) EDSU accepts Economics as the other Science subject.  
(ii) IMSU accepts a D7 in English Language for candidates 
with distinction in subjects relevant to the programme.  
(iii) ILORIN, ABUJA and OOU accept TC II merit/credit in 
relevant subjects.  
(iv) LASU and IMSU requires 'O' level credit passes 
inPhysics and any other Science   subject.  
(v) LAGOS requires five (5) 'O' levelcredit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Physics, and any two (2) of 
Chemistry or Biology, Agricultural Science or Further 
Mathematicsand Computer Studies/Data Processing.  
(vi) BENIN requires two(2) 'O' level credit passes in other 
SocialScience subjects.  
(vii) JOS does not accept TC II in Arithmetic as a subject for 
'O' level mathematics.   
(viii) RSUST and ABU require two (2) other Sciencesubjects.  
(ix) UYO requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language 
and Physics.  
(x) BOWEN  accepts  either  Biology  or 
 Agricultural   Science as Science subject.
